data.title: Initial MediaWiki installation and configuration
data.meta_description: There are two ways you can install MediaWiki on your account: Manually, by downloading the script to your computer and uploading the installation files and
data.text:
There are two ways you can install MediaWiki on your account:

Manually, by downloading the script to your computer and uploading the installation files and folders to your account.

Automatically from your Site Tools > Dev > App Installer.
